meanings.definition: To shout "huzzah" in celebration or approval.
meanings.sent1: The crowd was huzzahing loudly after the team won the championship.
meanings.sent2: People were huzzahing with joy at the sight of the fireworks.
meanings.sent3: The children started huzzahing when they found out there would be no school the next day.
meanings.sent4: The entire town was huzzahing as the mayor announced the new community center.
meanings.sent5: Huzzahing filled the air as the bride and groom walked down the aisle.

meanings.definition: The act of cheering or expressing joy with the word "huzzah".
meanings.sent1: His loud huzzahing echoed through the stadium.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers' huzzahing could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's huzzahing brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The huzzahing of the fans made the team feel proud.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the sound of huzzahing and laughter.

meanings.definition: The sound of a loud, enthusiastic cheer.
meanings.sent1: The huzzahing of the crowd was deafening at the concert.
meanings.sent2: A wave of huzzahing erupted when the announcement was made.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected huzzahing from the audience caught the performer off guard.
meanings.sent4: The huzzahing of the fans filled the stadium with energy.
meanings.sent5: The victorious team was greeted with huzzahing and applause.
